meanings.sent1: I saw a school of pikeperches swimming in the river.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen enjoy catching pikeperches for dinner.
meanings.sent3: Why did the pikeperches bring a fishing rod to the party? They wanted to catch up with old friends!
meanings.sent4: The pikeperches in the pond moved together like a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the pikeperches glistened under the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'pikeperch'.
meanings.sent1: There are many pikeperches swimming in the lake.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught several pikeperches during their trip.
meanings.sent3: The pikeperches gathered for a meeting to discuss their favorite fishing spots.
meanings.sent4: The pikeperches in the aquarium looked like a colorful bouquet.
meanings.sent5: The pikeperches darted around the tank, creating a mesmerizing display.
